slots.name: rare
slots.notes: main set only; borderless rude rider rares/mythics (333+) are collector-only

slots.name: uncommon
slots.notes: main set (1-291) + borderless revved up vehicles (292-332, uncommons only)

slots.name: common
slots.notes: main set (1-291) + borderless revved up vehicles (292-332, commons only)

slots.name: wildcard
slots.notes: any rarity from booster-eligible cards; borderless revved up C/U handled via rarity slots

slots.name: foil
slots.notes: any rarity; borderless revved up C/U may also appear as foil but requires rarity filtering not fully modeled
